mapper.select: SELECT lc_approval.`lc_approval_id`, lc_approval.`lc_status_id`, lc_approval.`lc_apply_id`, lc_approval.`lc_approval_remark`, lc_approval.`taskId`, DATE_FORMAT(lc_approval.`lc_approval_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `lc_approval_time`, lc_approval.`xt_userinfo_id`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName`, lc_status.`lc_status_name` FROM lc_approval lc_approval LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo AS xt_userinfo ON xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id = lc_approval.xt_userinfo_id LEFT JOIN lc_status lc_status ON lc_status.lc_status_id = lc_approval.lc_status_id WHERE lc_approval.lc_approval_id=#{lc_approval_id}
